messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is the origin of the metal in the story?
It is not a metal of Earth-ly origin.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of the diary with Joseph Turner's name inscribed?
To detail his backstory.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a suggested consequence of failure to open the lid from the inside?
The character passes out or has a Dream-vision sent from Gla'aki.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will August and Jacob do if the investigators flee the cabin?
They will wait for the cover of darkness to begin any pursuit.
You are a helpful assistant.
What will August and Jacob do if the investigators flee the cabin?
They will wait for the cover of darkness to pursue them.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where are the five surviving artists strapped to poles?
About five meters in from the shore of the stagnant lake.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is done to the artists by Gla'aki?
She pierces each one in the chest with a two-foot, metallic spine.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of getting close to the still-moving artists?
It triggers another Sanity roll, with 1/1D4 SAN loss.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the initial Sanity loss for Call for Sanity rolls?
1/1D6 SAN loss
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the initial Sanity loss if investigators get close to the artists?
1/1D4 SAN loss
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the message conveyed by the dying artists to the investigators?
There's a boy and a man, and a girl. One of us got away… The dead are trying to lift some-thing out of a pit.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the outcome of removing the spines from the artists' chests?
They each die with a scream
You are a helpful assistant.
What is happening to the characters in the text?
They are dying
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result of removing the spines from their chests?
They are freed from their pain and die
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when the players fail the group luck roll?
James Stanton and Dean Walters come from the nearby dig site to investigate
You are a helpful assistant.
Why are James Stanton and Dean Walters investigating?
Because of the attention the dying characters may attract
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigators fail to hide during the group Luck roll?
James Stanton and Dean Walters come from the nearby dig site to investigate.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigators are spotted by the undead servants?
The undead servants will attempt to overpower the investigators and drag them to the hut.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigators are captured by the undead servants?
They may be tied to the vacant poles, requiring a successful Hard STR or DEX roll to escape.
You are a helpful assistant.
What might happen if the investigators fail to escape the bonds?
The investigator may rock the pole so much that it falls over, landing the investigator face down in the water, or they may pass out and awaken at night as Gla'aki appears.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the investigator fails to justify the pushed roll?
The investigator rocks the pole so much that it falls over, landing the investigator face down in the water.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator if they are still bound when night falls?
The investigator passes out and awakens at night as Gla'aki appears.
You are a helpful assistant.
What do Turner and his gang do when night falls for the investigator?
They come to the lake to call forth Gla'aki and offer up the investigators.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the investigator if they are still bound when night falls and Turner's gang comes to the lake?
The investigator passes out and awakens at night as Gla'aki appears.
